MultiFeature.Name: Sharpshooter
MultiFeature.Text: You have mastered ranged weapons and can make shots that others find im possible. You gain the following benefits: • Attacking at long range doesn't impose disadvantage on your ranged weapon attack rolls. • Your ranged weapon attacks ignore half cover and three-quarters cover. • Before you make an attack with a ranged weapon that you are proficient with, you can choose to take a -5 penalty to the attack roll. If the attack hits, you add +10 to the attack’s damage.
